input_text: URGENT: Final exam scheduled for tomorrow at 9 AM in room 205. Please review all materials from chapters 1-12.
Reminder: Your research paper is due this Friday at 11:59 PM. Please submit via the online portal.
Group meeting scheduled for today at 3 PM in the library conference room. We need to finalize presentation slides.
Interview invitation for the research assistant position. Please confirm your availability for next Thursday at 10 AM in Professor Johnson's office.
Lab assignment 5 is now available. It's due next Tuesday at the beginning of class.
Guest speaker presentation next Friday about machine learning applications in healthcare. Starts at 2 PM in auditorium.
CRITICAL: Your scholarship application deadline is tomorrow. All documents must be submitted by end of day.
Midterm exam on Monday, March 3rd at 1 PM in the main lecture hall. Covers chapters 5-8.
Project presentation is scheduled for Wednesday at 11 AM. Each team gets 15 minutes to present.
Office hours moved to Wednesdays from 2-4 PM instead of Thursdays. Please update your calendars.
Career fair next week on Tuesday and Wednesday in the student union. Runs from 10 AM to 4 PM both days.
Study session tonight at 7 PM in room 301. We'll review for tomorrow's quiz on statistics.
Thesis defense scheduled for Friday, January 31st at 10 AM. Defense will be held in conference room B.
Workshop on research methods this Saturday from 9 AM to 12 PM in the graduate student lounge.
Final project submission deadline is December 15th. No extensions will be granted after this date.
